last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 1
last_episode_to_air.overview: The women must fight through dense tropical jungle vegetation in search of water. We follow them in the struggle to make fire for the water to be drinkable, which is vital in the extreme situation they are in.

name: Øya
overview: In "The Island", 12 Norwegian people of the same sex are landed on a deserted island in the Pacific, without knowing how long they should be there. They are completely cut off from civilization, and they are all alone. There is no filmcrew with them on the island, they are filming everything themselves. This is not Robinson's. It's not Farmen. On the island there are no rules, no competitions, no voting, only an intense cooperation to survive.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The women must fight through dense tropical jungle vegetation in search of water. We follow them in the struggle to make fire for the water to be drinkable, which is vital in the extreme situation they are in.
